name: The Three Primitives
description:
The Three Primitive shapes that make up all of today:
triangle, rectangle, and circle.
They build our world
and together fight off shapes and polys that fight to destroy the delicate balance of the geometric world,
and it is your job to lead them.

Controls
  • WASD to move
  • 1,2,3 to change heroes (1- Square 2 - Circle 3 - Triangle)
  • Left Mouse Button to fire or move (only with circle)
  • E to pickup weapons
